alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 9:04PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Kit Carson and southwestern Sherman Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 804 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking outflow from decaying thunderstorms near Bethune, or 8 miles west of Burlington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Burlington around 820 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kanorado. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 0 and 5. Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 425 and 450. Highway 385 between mile markers 181 and 196. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
